name: Makudan
description:
3D First-Person Danmaku inspired by Quake and Geometry Wars. 

Ascend from robotic hell by blasting through hordes of demonic drones equipped with their classic all-out projectile patterns.

Shoot (endlessly), dash, kill and GET OUT OF THIS projectile HELL! 

Controls:

WASD — movement

Left Shift — dash

T — enter bullet time
